title: Dying Voices
location: Oakland, California - Recursionist Facility, with quantum connections to 2150
key_scenes: Accidental deeper contact with original timeline
Meeting Dr. Lisa Park before the transmission
Regular quantum conversations over three weeks
Dr. Chen discussing final transmission preparation
Final message sent as connection degrades
revelations: Can interact with original timeline before transmission
Bootstrap timeline has eight billion people thriving

Two suicides before transmission due to waiting pressure

Final goodbyes as power fails in 2150 bunker
Elliot promises to honor them properly
planted_elements: Personal connections with 300 increase obligation weight
